mapper.select: select wid, wname, charge, lxphone, waddress, ismoren, branchid, cjdate, beizhu from projects.warehouse where branchid = #{branchid}
select wid, wname, charge, lxphone, waddress, ismoren, branchid, cjdate, beizhu from projects.warehouse where wid = #{wid}
select wid, wname, charge, lxphone, waddress, ismoren, branchid, cjdate, beizhu from projects.warehouse limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into projects.warehouse(wname, charge, lxphone, waddress, ismoren, branchid, cjdate, beizhu) values (#{wname}, #{charge}, #{lxphone}, #{waddress}, #{ismoren}, #{branchid}, #{cjdate}, #{beizhu})

insert into projects.warehouse(wname, charge, lxphone, waddress, ismoren, branchid, cjdate, beizhu) values
(#{entity.wname}, #{entity.charge}, #{entity.lxphone}, #{entity.waddress}, #{entity.ismoren}, #{entity.branchid}, #{entity.cjdate}, #{entity.beizhu})

insert into projects.warehouse(wname, charge, lxphone, waddress, ismoren, branchid, cjdate, beizhu) values
(#{entity.wname}, #{entity.charge}, #{entity.lxphone}, #{entity.waddress}, #{entity.ismoren}, #{entity.branchid}, #{entity.cjdate}, #{entity.beizhu})
on duplicate key update wname = values(wname) , charge = values(charge) , lxphone = values(lxphone) , waddress = values(waddress) , ismoren = values(ismoren) , branchid = values(branchid) , cjdate = values(cjdate) , beizhu = values(beizhu)
mapper.update:
update projects.warehouse
wname = #{wname},
charge = #{charge},
lxphone = #{lxphone},
waddress = #{waddress},
ismoren = #{ismoren},
branchid = #{branchid},
cjdate = #{cjdate},
beizhu = #{beizhu},
where wid = #{wid}
